website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced golf cart cover that has grommets around the bottom for securing it.
pros: Will fit a four-seat golf cart and those models with extended roofs, as it has an 80-inch length
Large enough to accommodate carts with armrests
Durable fabric that will protect the golf cart from sun, water, and dirt
Consists of heavy-duty polyester that will resist tearing
Includes both front and rear vents for airflow
cons: Not made for smaller golf carts
Not quite long enough to cover tires on tall carts

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I often find on-line products not meeting my expectations, but this cart cover is exceptional. The material is thicker than expected and the craftsmanship appears top-notched. The zipper is of reasonable quality, but if I had to pick one thing to improve upon this would be the area that I chose. Don't get me wrong- I don't find it to be a weakness, but considering the profile of a covered cart I would have paid more for a kahuna sized zipper. I have high expectations and would definitely recommend this purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Made Well - Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: This cover has a nice weight to it and the zipper looks like it will hold up. I have a 1996 Ez Go with a back seat, but not the extended roof. Some of my campground neighbors have covers that do not look nearly as nice as this one. The fabric is much heavier than some of the flimsy looking covers. I believe that it will provide good winter protection for the gold cart.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shea

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd golf cover I have purchased for my cart and this one is by far the most superior of the 3. Great fit for the extended roof model which is what I have and the material is a much higher quality than that of my past covers. I paid $100 each for my last 2 covers from the golf cart dealer and $66 for this one from Amazon and it's a much better cover. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: TonyRig

customer_reviews.title: but it fit great. So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The Golf Cart Cover fit perfectly to our Cart. Our Golf Cart is 9 feet long in total. We have a full top that covers the passenger seat on the back. We were worried that it wouldn't be big enough, but it fit great. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Exact same cover but smaller
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cover & wears very well. Holds up in the sun...however, this exact same one as my first is a bit smaller & the golf cart hasn’t grown so I don’t know what is going on with the sizing...same cover but smaller
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Really great golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Really great golf cart cover. We are annual campers in the Poconos. Our site is located in all sun on top of a ridge. The eyelets for the bungee cord to be strapped underneath really prevents it from blowing off on windy days. We have found that after we put it on, it is a little extra help to tuck the front and back under the tires taught to further prevent blowing off.
customer_reviews.author: Duck66

customer_reviews.title: Easy, full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Easy, full coverage. Hasn't been through a full season of weather yet but looks good for now, happy to update if anything changes or wear and tear after the winter impacts it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cover still looks and performs like new. The fabric is thick
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for over a year now. It covers a cart that sits outside year round in Florida sun and rain. The cover still looks and performs like new. The fabric is thick, great quality. The zipper is heavy duty. I can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality cover (works for lifted and rear seat ezgo carts)
customer_reviews.text: 100% awesome cover. Fits my ezgo with a rear seat and the cart is lifted as well. I would definitely buy this again. We store our cart outdoors in the summer and this is a very high quality cover. Cant be beat for the price. If you are looking for a 100% rainproof cover, you will need to spend quite a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this cover for over one year now and use it to protect my very large and awkwardly shaped 650 pound smoker (the only thing I could come up with that would fit completely over it) and it does the job quite nicely. Even though I'm using this cover not necessarily for it's intended purpose It has held up quite well and really appears to be made of high quality material.... very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cover and remove
customer_reviews.text: Easy to cover and remove. Fits 4 passenger club car with lift kit and oversized tires perfectly. Waterproof, light weight and easy to stow away once removed: Great value in both quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is great and one person can put it on
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 4 seater Club Car very well. It is light weight and breathable, which is great and one person can put it on. I like that it is washable and has grommets so I can use bungee cords. I think the price is good and I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for almost a year and it’s still holding up well. Faded but no rips. Fits our Yamaha g19 with work bed perfect
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great protection  that stays on for a 4 person cart.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and great material. So far it’s been holding up while taking it on and off the last week. Would recommend to anyone looking for a high end cover.
customer_reviews.author: Spafeet

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: After a summer in Arizona it looked like new. Very pleased with the cover. It fits the Golf cart very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Club Car with extended roof. Keeps the dust and the neighborhood cats off my golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: cover works well as expected. It was purchased in April, 2018. It fit our 2013 Yamaha golf cart. It has already endured 3-5 heavy rain storms with high winds. I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Gijoe

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cover, they last about 30 months in the Florida sun. It would last longer if I rotated the way the cart faces the sun. The cover is on 93 percent of the time.
customer_reviews.author: MAX J. FULMER

customer_reviews.title: does not stay down
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality but all winter long I am constantly pulling it back down. Needs to have anchors in the front and back to help hold it down properly.
customer_reviews.author: jerseygirl744

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fits my 2012 Yamaha cart with the rear flip down seats great. It's so easy to put on that I can do it by myself. My old covers got stiff and cracked and was a pain in the butt to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Very good cover and completely covers the entire golf cart
customer_reviews.text: Very good cover and completely covers the entire golf cart. It would be nice to have more thicker material, as I am using it in the outdoor exposure area in Florida, so it may not last as long. Time will only tell.
customer_reviews.author: James Wiesner

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very durable. I've bought a handful of these and I keep supplying the campground I'm in with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rick F.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits and protects our cart perfectly. Has not faded as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Covington

customer_reviews.title: not exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Deluxe 4 Passenger Golf Cart Cover- Taupe 112"lx48"x66"h information said the cover was water proof.....it is NOT. it is nicely made and protects from dust and pollen etc. but water/rain goes right through it. we used a spray water repellent on it so we'll see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stone

customer_reviews.title: The best cover ever
customer_reviews.text: I just love this cover, it is heavy duty and fits my golf cart completely even over the back seat and over both ends... easy to put on and the air vents keep it clean and dry inside.. after seeing this cover, several of my neighbors bought the same one and are just as well pleased
customer_reviews.author: Bette249

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly as described. Fits perfectly and very happy with purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf Cart Cover
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped very fast and received as indicated. The cover completely covers my Club Car fitted with a rear seat with a short top, which does not extend over the rear seat. It is protecting my golf cart from the element while the cart is parked under an open carport.
customer_reviews.author: rrman61

customer_reviews.title: It has got us covered!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and a reasonable price for a quality product. Tight fitting around the base and material is very durable. Already been through a rain storm with wind gusts at 30 mph. Cover stayed put with no additional tie downs. Easy on and off....just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: wallycrow

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover have had it for awhile now
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover have had it for awhile now. We live in Florida, the golf cart is not under cover. The cover still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 passenger golf cart that has a lift kit, oversized tires and an extended roof. This cover fits almost to a "t" and covers the entire cart including the tires. There is approximately 5 inches of the tire that are exposed out the bottom, but we are extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Frank

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved and no longer have garage. This cover has proved to be worth its weight in golf for protecting my cart.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: do not keep in sun for one week.
customer_reviews.text: can not be a cover .. use only in cool and shade place.
customer_reviews.author: ALI - KUWAIT

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover is just what expected
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable cover. Sturdy and covers the cart. Very well made. Would highly suggest this for other friends to purchase. Will last for years
customer_reviews.author: Michele O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Was really amazed by the cover. It was an exceptional fit for our gas Club Car. Great price, goes over the wheels and is roomie. I would recommend it to anyone needing a golf cart cover.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: NIce sturdy cover. Arrived on time. Wears very well. Have had it for a while now. HIghly recommend this cover. Fits on nicely. ties are a big help . color good.
customer_reviews.author: diane page

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! We live at the beach and the wind and sun are constant. He holds up wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great durability. Would definitely recommend! It fit my club car perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: camper
customer_reviews.text: I love the cover very easy to use nice color one person can easily place it on the golf cart.I would strongly aprove this the price was good happy all the way around thank you

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great built quality. It does keep my EZGO MPT dry.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was very good by too big for my golf cart.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping dry
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. It has out lasted my friends cover that he bought from the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover we bought from Amazon works well to protect our golf cart when we're not using our cart. The cover is strong, but light weight.
customer_reviews.author: jcgrandma

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is a pretty good product for the price. The fit is well. It appears to be weatherproof.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove and works well, glad we made the purchase. Weatherproof and kept the critters off as well.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cart cover
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a larger than needed cover because our cart is lifted. This worked perfectly and so easy to put on and take off.

customer_reviews.title: It protects our golf cart from the rain, pollen and tree debris
customer_reviews.text: It arrives as expected and does what it is supposed to do. We are pleased and the price was right.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cover is exactly what I was looking for and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe 4 passenger golf cart cover roof 80" L - Taupe - fits EZ GO, Club Car
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice golf cart cover - and the price was certainly right. And I got it in three days after ordering too- was entirely happy with the purchase. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit our new golf cart perfectly. Easy off and on too. Does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: LR Martz

customer_reviews.title: This is great water and rain stays off my golf cart when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great water and rain stays off my golf cart when I am not at the camper. The rain pills and rolls right off.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and appears to be well made and durable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and stays on. Keeps the sun off. Time will only tell now long it will last.

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart cover. It's very lightweight and easy to put on. Keeps my E-Z-GO 2FIVE looking nice! I recommend this one!

customer_reviews.title: Different color
customer_reviews.text: very good cover only gripe would be is the color. Would be better in my opinion if it came in black. The color taup stains easy

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have the cover protecting my cart.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Good quality and reasonable priced. I will continue to purchase the same item when needed. Thank you. Alejandro Vazquez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bought cheap, Got cheap
customer_reviews.text: Long wait for delivery, material a lot thinner than expected, zipper is useless
customer_reviews.author: Lee Zurman

customer_reviews.title: It is what was described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to protect my golf cart and it does just that. It does what it's supposed to.

customer_reviews.title: Club Car 4 Passenger Golf Cart Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits very well, only have had it less than a month, time will tell how durable it is.

customer_reviews.title: golf car cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover to protect my golf car from the weather. It completely covers my car and the protection is great.
customer_reviews.author: Walter C. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The cover is of a nice quality fabric and the elastic around the bottom keeps it snug. There are grommets in the middle on both sides at the bottom so I hooked a bungee cord through the grommets underneath to ensure the wind couldn't come up under and blow it off. Just a little extra insusrance. I am very happy with my purchase. We have had wind and rain and my cover is still in place and my golf cart protected!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. Easy to put on and take off. Came in on time and fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cover I have ever purchased. Far better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: have purchased several covers and this one is the best that I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: have purchased several covers and this one is the best that I have purchased. I am anxious to see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Randall T.

customer_reviews.title: Rainy days are here again.
customer_reviews.text: The color was at stated. The size was as stated. The stitching & construction was as stated. But, when it rains, THE WATER COMES THROUGH THE FABRIC. I don't know why a "true" water repellent finish wasn't used. It protects the cart from the sun - not rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Nones

customer_reviews.title: NICE COVER
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY MADE. THE SECOND COVER BOUGHT FROM THIS COMPANY BECAUSE IT IS MADE NICE. WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANY ONE TO BUY.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great cover.........!!!!!!!! Fits Golf Cart well .Good for keeping cart dry good price also would buy again. we all love love love it...!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Golf Cart Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Fast shipping and a great value. Thanks Formosa Covers!!

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as good as first one I bought for my other golf cart.

customer_reviews.title: Material was light and very affective. It did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Material was light and very affective. It did not fit a four passenger club car not big enough. Could not zip the back.
customer_reviews.author: roger nauman

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting golf cart cover  : )
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, folds easily and doesn't take up much room underneath back seat in storage area. Durable though all types of weather: strong wind and rain storms, cold and hot blazing sun.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described - fits our golf cart and protects from sun and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: R2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover. Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover. Heavy duty. Nice zipper. Fits my Precedent perfectly tight, so it does not allow wind up underneath it to blow it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the thickness
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the thickness, much better than the cheap, thin cover I bought only 8 months ago. This should last for years!
customer_reviews.author: John Deacon

customer_reviews.title: perfect product
customer_reviews.text: this product is great, it arrived in the time time that was posted and with out damage. it fit perfect good material and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo G. Vincenzi

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a quality fit. I have a Club Car 4 seat cart with full top and this cover fits so perfect. We have lots of rain here in the summer and the cover keeps it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Pence

customer_reviews.title: it's easy and fast to cover the cart
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted something to protect our cart when we're not using it--This turned out to be just the thing we needed. It is light weight, and once you use it a time or two, it's easy and fast to cover the cart.. And it kept the rain out--I think it will help a lot with protecting the interior from the sun as well. Great job, very useful cover.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Club Car
customer_reviews.text: Quality was OK, but take the time to find one made for the Club Car. The plastic over the windshield is not needed if you have an existing windshield. It has remained wrinkled and can hardly see thru it. Had to do modifications to make it attach to windshiels'roof supports. Wish i had done better.
customer_reviews.author: Lavelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my 4 passenger cart great. It is easy to put on and remove and and water resistant too..great buy

customer_reviews.title: deluxe 4 passenger golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is the best. Easy to handle zipper is nice and long. Fits on cart perfectly. I recommend this to all.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cover that fits my 4 person cart exactly as described.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover meets and surpasses all my expectations - great material - great fit. I Would recommend to a friend.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For price works as advertised. Only difficult part is distinguishing what is the front and back.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: I've ownwed it for over two years and it is stilll holding up well. Bought three more for friends and everyone is completely satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover.
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. Product meets all expectations, and is a high quality product. It covers the golf cart more than adequately
customer_reviews.author: Leo R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my cover. Zipper functioned nicely and cover was well made. Very functional and wetaher teh rain very well.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Foret

customer_reviews.title: Works on my lifted EZ-Go with No Issues
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to cover a lifted EZ-Go with a rear seat. The cover arrived well packaged and the addition of the storage bag was a nice surprise. The cover easily fits the lifted golf cart and goes down almost to the ground. So far (its been about a month) its has kept the dust and debris off the cart when not in use as the cart is stored outside under a covered lean to. I like how easy it is to cover with the addition of the zippered back.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J English

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the new golf cart UNDERCOVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We keep our new golf cart in the country where we camp and we got this to keep it covered from all the dust on the road that everyone goes on in the little camping community and also to keep the sun from doing it's worse!!! It fits perfectly and covers all but the bottom of the tires!!! WE LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits perfect and it does not blow off in high winds. It also protects from rain and snow. I was amazed on how nice the cover really is.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Golf Cart Cover
customer_reviews.text: We keep our golf cart by the ocean so the cover has been very helpful in keeping the salt air off of it.
customer_reviews.author: PETE MCMORRIS

customer_reviews.title: golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Very good cover for the money. Time well tell if it works as well as new in 1 or 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Harp

customer_reviews.title: best one we've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty material, seems it will hold up well Fits very well and has withstood rain storm and wind. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Susan Laird

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe 4 Passenger Golf Cart Cover
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on the golf cart this afternoon, fits nicely and easy to put on, and looks very nice. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Wensel

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. The golf cart shop wanted to charge $700 for a cover. I found these for $65. The cover is pretty heavy duty and easy to use for one person. It looks great on the cart. My first cover lasted 2 years in the hot South Florida sun before developing tears. I figure $33/year is pretty great for the level of protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGirl

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. This was more than I expected and it fits well and is very easy to put on and take off. It even comes with its own storage bag and is easy to stuff into bag for storage. I would recommend this to anyone with 4 seater.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.text: Was all we expected it to be. Best price we could find.

customer_reviews.text: bought this for both my golf carts... nice cover, extra length makes covering much easier than previous cover. Protects well in rain

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my neighbour. He covered his electric cart and with a few bungee cords he has it wrapped up for the snowy winter we usually get. It seems well made and should hold up well. We will see how it weathers next spring
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: Golf Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great item quality. Cover was as stated and delivery was very fast. Rate the seller and product AAA1.

customer_reviews.title: club car cover 4 seater

product_meta.title: Deluxe 4 Seater Golf Cart Cover roof 80" L (Grey, Taupe, or Green), Fits E Z GO, Club Car and Yamaha G Model - Fits GEM e2
feature_bullets: Imagine not having to dust off or clean your 4 passenger golf cart before use. Our cover Protects your golf cart from sun, weather damage and dirt while storing
This is NOT a cheap nylon cover like most others on the market. Constructed of heavy duty UV coated satin Polyester with a double Polyurethane undercoating
Double top stitched for durability. Plus we included Grommets along the bottom to allow the cover to be secured or cable locked to cart
Convenient rear zipper allows access to cart without removing cover. Comes with duffel bag for portability and storage of cover when driving your golf cart
Fits most standard golf carts with bench seat on back and roof up to 80"L - Color: Taupe
